com.esplibrary.bluetooth

Interface RSSICallback


  • public interface RSSICallback
    Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when RSSI has been determined for a BLE device.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onRssiReceived(BluetoothDevice device, int rssi)
      Callback method to be invoked when RSSI has been received.

    • Method Detail

      • onRssiReceived

        void onRssiReceived(BluetoothDevice device,
                    int rssi)
        Callback method to be invoked when RSSI has been received.
        Parameters:
        device - the remote bluetooth device for which this RSSI callback was invoked.
        rssi - the received signal strength in dBm. The valid range is [-127, 126]
